title: i think a flexable fun kit knight champ with a holy sword would be cool in league
body:
i think league can use a a cliche knight champ, not like garen, think slim lean duelist wielding a holy sword.,most of the balance would be in gameplay skill and interactions. hed have to be a generalist that can assassinate\skirmish\or tank/tankbust all depending on build. an example kit i can think of on the spot would be passive(holy sword) every 3rd attack on the same target, champ names blade shines with holy light gaining extra range and going through some armor q(arcane beam) a bread and butter skillshot from his sword doing some dmg and a slow w ruthless slash slashes 3 times in front of him doing dmg and applying on hits with each swing in a short cone in front of him, attack speed affects animation speed of the ability and how fast it finishes(main power budget iconic identity ability) e throws his sword in a line, if it hits an enemy he can click on them to blink to the sword grab it and apply an empowered basic attack and in his ult hed unlock the full potential of the holy sword gaining one empowered ability cast and one crit on passive ult q has longer range and after it hits, light erupts from the ground where it landed dealing dmg and applying grounded, ult w after the 3 slashes he also does 3 stabs in a straight line, doing more dmg and applying onhits again ult e after the blink and empowered aa, he raises the sword in a upward sing doing dmg and knocking up

thats just an example kit, but the point is i think itd be cool to have a knight champ in this game, with the balancing based on gameplay mechanics and skills, who is generalistic as all knights are at the same time as having a complex kit. basically a knight that champ that can asassinate, duel, or tank based on what he builds and needs to do for that game. for example in the kit i portrayed, u can play as an assassin by going duskblade ie static, his e will give him the tools he need to do dmg and get to his targets so against a team of say brand ashe evelynn soraka kenenn thatd be what u want to do. but against shyvana maokai lissandra draven blitz u can go onhits like botrk etc and duel/tank bust
dont focus on the kit too much, just a on the spot concept but i think a knight that danced around the rift with his sword and outplays his opponents by gameplay elements and is flexable would be cool

replies.body: Seems like a neat concept, would love to see it come to life.
Doesn't  Fiora kinda fit your description? Except she isn't a knight by lore.
We do need more knights, dragon Slayer Pantheon is a phony.
